level.heading: EMERGENCY MEDICAL SERVICES AGENCIES[COLON] LOCATION (ยง 29-505)

level.text: An Emergency Medical Services Agency shall maintain a fixed physical location. The agency shall notify the Director no fewer than thirty (30) days prior to any change in the location before the agency moves to the new location.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Rules of the Board of Public Welfare issued July 28, 1950; as amended on September 29, 1950; and by Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 8542 (December 4, 1998); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 16569 (December 6, 2013).
